about.summary: A command-line interface to 'GGobi', an interactive and dynamic graphics package. 'Rggobi' complements the graphical user interface of 'GGobi' providing a way to fluidly transition between analysis and exploration, as well as automating common tasks.

name: r-rggobi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.1.22' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rggobi
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rggobi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rggobi/rggobi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ce61e6127341dd702a94f40196ae243c17665ac94dcdbc1795b3271d5527f3bc

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  skip: True   # [win]
  number: 1001
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{posix}}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{posix}}sed               # [win]
    - {{posix}}grep              # [win]
    - {{posix}}autoconf
    - {{posix}}automake          # [not win]
    - {{posix}}automake-wrapper  # [win]
    - {{posix}}pkg-config
    - {{posix}}make
    - {{posix}}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rgtk2
    - ggobi
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-rgtk2
    - ggobi

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rggobi')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rggobi')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ggobi/rggobi, http://www.ggobi.org/rggobi
  license: BSD_3_clause
  summary: A command-line interface to 'GGobi', an interactive and dynamic graphics package.
    'Rggobi' complements the graphical user interface of 'GGobi' providing a way to
    fluidly transition between analysis and exploration, as well as automating common
    tasks.
  license_family: BSD

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
